main event: Four civilians reported seeing two bright orange or yellow lights moving slowly over Dayton, Ohio on 30 October 1952.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 1.5 minutes,The lights were seen quite close together and traveling in the sky from 1921 to 2025,Four witnesses confirmed the sighting,The lights were described as brighter than average aircraft lights,Conclusions from the report suggested they could be aircraft or astronomical phenomena, but data was insufficient for definitive evaluation.
sighted object: two bright orange or yellow lights
